title: NO COMMISSION FOR A STUDENT STUDIO NEAR VICTOR HUGO AVENUE
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


NO COMMISSION FOR A STUDENT STUDIO NEAR VICTOR HUGO AVENUE 

in a nice building stone with a digicode and a lift with a securit door nice student studio 
with a shower room , the room with a an armchair that you can open for sleeping and double windows 
two fires for cooking and a fridge for your alimentation 
all white paintings and wooden floor . 

this student studio is in a very animous district with a lot of shops. SUPERMARKETS, chemist, baker and so.....

Please write with your direct adress mail and your direct mobile phone french or whattsapp
650 + 50 fees including central heating
